kiti mama hamadamath oyata kiyanawane mata thiyanne debidi jiwithayak.eka paththakin mama harima udyogimath,ee wagema  harima katakarayi,hama welawema sathutin inna balanawa, oonema deyak sahalluwen bara gannawa.me  nisama  mage honda gathiguna katawathma nopenena eka ganath mama aththatama duk wenawa.wisheshayenma wadihitiyan mawa ganan noganna eka mage hitha aththatama ridawanawa.-1944 agosthu 01-

mathara siti-sondars, guwan hamuda-niwyangs, don bosko-siwil aarakshaka ha apkantri layans-kaluthara pak athara tharaga jaya parajayen thorawa nimawiya.nithi wirodhi kridawa hethuwen dadi awawada nikuth kota rathu kad penwa pitiyen iwathkala nawalapitiya apkantri pilata krida karana aprikanu kridaka patrik, guwan hamuda pile nipuna bandara ha blustar kridaka em.tharahath yana kridakayanta idiri tharagaya bagin thahanam we.me sathi anthaye tharagaheta (18da) blustar-sondars kaluthara di, jawalen-supar san sitilig pitiyedi, pelikans-don bosko maliga pitiyedi.anidda (19da) kolambaa kri.sa-rathnam sugathadasa pitiyedi, nigambu yuth-nawika maristela pitiyedi, mathara siti-guwan uyanwaththa pitiyedi, siwil aarakshaka-polis si.aar.pitiyedi, niwyangas-yuda albat ef.pitiyedi, rinawun-apkantri nawalapitiyedi, solid-kaluthara pak anuradhapurayedi.
me prakashakayata minimarum chodana natha.
